title: Property Damage Caused by Limestone Mining Operations
subject: and solicitations
appropriations

abstracts.abstract:
Property Damage Caused by Limestone Mining Operations;  Provides that certain property owners who have sustained property damage as result of limestone mining operations have right to file claim for compensation; provides claims requirements; requires such claims to be brought within specified period of time; requires Division of Administrative Hearings to adjudicate such claims; provides for adjudication process; provides annual appropriation; requires state to compensate property owners' whose claims are upheld for certain costs.
    
        APPROPRIATION:
        Indeterminate

actions.description: Referred to Civil Justice & Claims Subcommittee
Now in Civil Justice & Claims Subcommittee
